1.desc: It's time to discuss basic combat techniques!
1.name: Basics of Battle

10.desc: Your journey as a Summoner traveling across Grand Gaia has begun! Go forth, and don't forget what Tilith taught you!
10.name: Start of Adventure

1000.desc: A world of inferno awaits you as you proceed further into the dark cave. The molten lava glows brightly, but behind it lies a sinister darkness.
1000.name: Scorching Roars

100000.desc: The sacred grounds from which all living beings originate. Soak up some of the overflowing Karma.
100000.name: Sacred Land of the Souls Lv. 1

1000000.desc:
A mysterious area that suddenly appeared in the Vortex.
On orders from the Akras Summoners’ Hall, hunters are being sent to investigate the area and rid it of monsters.
1000000.name: The Domain of Despair

1000001.desc:
A mysterious area that suddenly appeared in the Vortex.
On orders from the Akras Summoners' Hall, hunters are being sent to investigate the area and rid it of monsters.
1000001.name: A Year's Trajectory

100001.desc: Further within the sacred grounds from which all living beings originate. Soak up even more of the overflowing Karma.
100001.name: Sacred Land of the Souls Lv. 2

1000010.desc: You're nearing the center of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Who knows what could be waiting for you in this uncharted frontier…
1000010.name: Uncharted Frontier - Middle

1000011.desc: You're nearing the end of the mysterious area that appeared beyond the Vortex Gate. Mad beasts far more powerful than those you've come across before await you.
1000011.name: Uncharted Frontier - End

100002.desc: A hidden domain in the sanctuary that watches over all living things. Now's your chance to get more Karma than you could ever imagine!
100002.name: Sacred Land of the Souls Lv. 3

100050.desc: It is said this is where souls come to be forged. Here is your chance to gain experience as a Summoner as well as some Karma.
100050.name: Soul Sanctuary Lv. 1

100051.desc: You are deep within the area where it's said souls come to be forged. Now's your chance to obtain lots of experience as a Summoner as well as Karma.
100051.name: Soul Sanctuary Lv. 2

100052.desc: You're at the far end of the area where it's said souls come to be forged. Now's your chance to obtain heaps of experience as a Summoner and Karma.
100052.name: Soul Sanctuary Lv. 3

1001.desc: Who knows how long the simmering lava has been waiting in this cave for its chance to rise to the surface. Soon its pressure will force it out.
1001.name: A Torch in the Darkness

100100.desc: Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some Evolution Material Units!
100100.name: Garden of Nymphs

100101.desc: Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some rare Evolution Material Units!
100101.name: Garden of Spirits

100102.desc: Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some super rare Evolution Material Units!
100102.name: Garden of Idols

100103.desc: It is said that those with good taste hold lavish parties to display their favorite pots. It is rumored that these pots are also very rare evolution materials...
100103.name: Phantom Pots

1002.desc: This land is said to inspire the spirit of warfare in its inhabitants. Judging from the enemies standing in your way, this seems to be true.
1002.name: The Commander of Fire

100200.desc: A dangerous cave full of traps to ensnare those who dare enter. Despite its dangers, many still venture after its treasures.
100200.name: The Box of Desires Lv. 1

100201.desc: Further into the dangerous, trap-filled cave. Mountains of treasure or oceans of despair, who knows what awaits!
100201.name: The Box of Desires Lv. 2

100202.desc: There are many secrets in this trap-filled cave. Do you fear getting trapped in despair, or are you hopeful to find riches!?
100202.name: The Box of Desires Lv. 3

1003.desc: The scalding lava plunges at you all of a sudden. If it hits you, you'll suffer far more than fourth degree burns. However, worse dangers lie ahead...
1003.name: An Encounter with Flames

100300.desc: The Temple of Fire, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100300.name: Ruins of Fire Lv. 3

100301.desc: The Temple of Water, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100301.name: Ruins of Water Lv. 3

100302.desc: The Temple of Earth, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100302.name: Ruins of Earth Lv. 3

100303.desc: The Temple of Thunder, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100303.name: Ruins of Thunder Lv. 3

100304.desc: This temple is devoted to a god who's said to have the power to draw out one's ultimate power. The power to defeat gods awaits you deep within.
100304.name: Ruins of Miracles Lv. 4

100310.desc: The Temple of Light, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100310.name: Ruins of Light

100311.desc: The Temple of Dark, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100311.name: Ruins of Dark

100320.desc: A Fire pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100320.name: Sanctum of Fire Lv. 6

100321.desc: A Water pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100321.name: Sanctum of Water Lv. 6

100322.desc: An Earth pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100322.name: Sanctum of Earth Lv. 6

100323.desc: A Thunder pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100323.name: Sanctum of Thunder Lv. 6

100324.desc: A Light pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100324.name: Sanctum of Light Lv. 6

100325.desc: A Dark pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100325.name: Sanctum of Dark Lv. 6

1004.desc: A hero wielding a sword of fire waits ahead. You must somehow sneak past the mix of holy and unholy flames and make it out of the cave.
1004.name: Sword of Fire

100400.desc: Heroes and spirits from all over gather among these dangerous ruins. Now's your chance to gather hordes of Material Units!
100400.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 1

100401.desc: Deeper within the dangerous ruins, home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to get some valuable Material Units!
100401.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 2

100402.desc: The deepest reaches of the dangerous ruins, home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to obtain some rare Material Units!
100402.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 3

100403.desc: This hidden area is home to dangerous relics from heroes and warriors all over. Now's your chance to get these otherwise hard to get materials!
100403.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 4

100404.desc: These sealed off ruins are home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to obtain some super rare materials!
100404.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 5

100500.desc: This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters made of Zel, the currency of this world..
100500.name: Gold Valley Lv. 1

100501.desc: This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters packed full of Zel, the currency of this world.
100501.name: Gold Valley Lv. 2

100502.desc: This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters bursting full of Zel, the currency of this world.
100502.name: Gold Valley Lv. 3

100600.desc: Take part in this grand parade and capture some of these metal type monsters, bursting full of fusion experience!!
100600.name: Metal Parade!

100601.desc: A grand procession featuring only Metal Units that are Super Rare and above! Metal Kings and above guaranteed, don't miss this great chance!
100601.name: Super Metal Parade!

100602.desc: A grand procession featuring Fire Metal monsters with loads of Fire experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100602.name: Fire Metal Parade

100603.desc: A grand procession featuring Water Metal monsters with loads of Water experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100603.name: Water Metal Parade

100604.desc: A grand procession featuring Earth Metal monsters with loads of Earth experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100604.name: Earth Metal Parade

100605.desc: A grand procession featuring Thunder Metal monsters with loads of Thunder experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100605.name: Thunder Metal Parade

100606.desc: A grand procession featuring Light Metal monsters with loads of Light experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100606.name: Light Metal Parade

100607.desc: A grand procession featuring Dark Metal monsters with loads of Dark experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100607.name: Dark Metal Parade

100608.desc: A grand procession featuring Fire Metal monsters with loads of Fire experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100608.name: Fire Metal Parade

100609.desc: A grand procession featuring Water Metal monsters with loads of Water experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100609.name: Water Metal Parade

100610.desc: A grand procession featuring Earth Metal monsters with loads of Earth experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100610.name: Earth Metal Parade

100611.desc: A grand procession featuring Thunder Metal monsters with loads of Thunder experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100611.name: Thunder Metal Parade

100612.desc: A grand procession featuring Light Metal monsters with loads of Light experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100612.name: Light Metal Parade

100613.desc: A grand procession featuring Dark Metal monsters with loads of Dark experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100613.name: Dark Metal Parade

100650.desc: A big parade of Jewel monsters full of Zel is coming your way! The hunt for riches is on!
100650.name: Jewel Parade!

100651.desc: Here comes a mystical parade full of high class jewel monsters. Now's your chance to get super rich with Kings and higher guaranteed!
100651.name: Super Jewel Parade

100700.desc: A traveler on the first steps of her journey. Her inexperience clouds her ability to see the value in friendship.
100700.name: The Lone Traveller Lv. 1

100701.desc: A traveler who has come to be known throughout the land. She's realized the value of having someone to train with.
100701.name: The Lone Traveller Lv. 2

100702.desc: A valiant traveler who commands praise wherever she goes. She continues her journey, always on the look out for worthy allies.
100702.name: The Lone Traveller Lv. 3

100703.desc: A celebrated traveler who is almost unmatched in her swordsmanship. Her skills had brought her to be able to match herself to fight against the gods' invasion.
100703.name: The Lone Traveller Lv. 4

100800.desc: Living among the shadows, his pride as a ninja warrants him little contact with others. Few are harder to pin down than he.
100800.name: Dweller in the Darkness Lv. 1

100801.desc: Acting under the cover of night, there's no objective he can't achieve. Who knows what it'd take to capture such a man.
100801.name: Dweller in the Darkness Lv. 2

100802.desc: Enveloped in a burning red darkness, only the strongest could even stir this man, whose training has cleansed him of all desire.
100802.name: Dweller in the Darkness Lv. 3

100803.desc: A man whose soul that is one with the darkness and mastered total discipline within. To see a red glow in the shadows would deem one's certain death.
100803.name: Dweller in the Darkness Lv. 4

100900.area: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100900.desc: Rebelling against his heritage as a blacksmith in his younger days, it'd take a lot more than strong wits to gain this man's allegiance.
100900.dungeon: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100900.name: Bearer of the God Arm Lv. 1

100901.area: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100901.desc: Creating his own path as a blacksmith, he has come to acknowledge the raw strength that others possess.
100901.dungeon: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100901.name: Bearer of the God Arm Lv. 2

100902.area: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100902.desc: He soon came to be known as the God Arm, though this power he only showed to those he deemed worthy.
100902.dungeon: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100902.name: Bearer of the God Arm Lv. 3

100903.area: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100903.desc: Smith Lord, people called him. For he forged an almighty weapon to fight against the gods' invasion.
100903.dungeon: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100903.name: Bearer of the God Arm Lv. 4

1010.desc: Frozen winds rush at you. The fact that the black cave of molten lava exists so close to this snowfield reminds you that nature is a force to be reckoned with.
1010.name: Battling the Ice Dragon

101000.desc: A pirate as brutal as she is beautiful. Many have tried, and failed, to thaw her impenetrable icy heart...
101000.name: Flower in the Frost Lv. 1

101001.desc: Her ferocity and coldness of character are notorious throughout the seas. Rumor has it that even the Sea King was unable to dent her frosty exterior.
101001.name: Flower in the Frost Lv. 2

101002.desc: Her attacks and insults freeze the hearts of both enemies and allies alike. Captain of a huge fleet of pirate ships, she has no time for any but the strongest of individuals.
101002.name: Flower in the Frost Lv. 3

101003.desc: Frost forms on the ground she treads, fierce gales and icy blizzards tear through her foes. Her frozen wrath challenging the gods.
101003.name: Flower in the Frost Lv. 4

1011.desc: You take a peek in all directions and are met with stark whiteness. Try not to lose your sense of direction. Follow the sparse trees and the sun's movements.
1011.name: Snowbound Waypoints

101100.desc: A boxer who set out on an epic journey to discover her origins. Her fists make mincemeat out of any who dare to approach her.
101100.name: The Iron-Fisted Lady Lv. 1

101101.desc: She has sworn to continue traveling until she finds the answers she’s looking for. A world of hurt awaits any who stand in her way.
101101.name: The Iron-Fisted Lady Lv. 2

101102.desc: None exist who haven’t heard of this true brawling legend. She respects only those who understand the true meaning of destruction.
101102.name: The Iron-Fisted Lady Lv. 3

101103.desc: A martial artist at her very peak, a master of brute destruction. Pride is her only weakness.
101103.name: The Iron-Fisted Lady Lv. 4

1012.desc: Just as with Karl, you have faith that Grahdens is safe. But your loss of words to console Karl is regrettable.
1012.name: Brave through the Ice

101200.desc: A fighter who seeks great power to protect the one he loves. He pays attention only to those who exude the kind of power he desires.
101200.name: When Lightning Strikes Lv. 1

101201.desc: A fighter who travels the world in search of the one he loves. The encounters and experiences he absorbs along the way add to his burgeoning strength.
101201.name: When Lightning Strikes Lv. 2

101202.desc: A fighter with a kick powerful enough to crush even gods. Known as "Thunder Kick," he only has time for those who he thinks demonstrate enough power themselves.
101202.name: When Lightning Strikes Lv. 3

101203.desc: A fighter who has honed his abilities beyond godlike, every smiting kick he delivers smashes with lightning electrocution.
101203.name: When Lightning Strikes Lv. 4

1013.desc: You sense a sudden drop in temperature around you. Judging from experience, this means danger is not far off.
1013.name: Princess of the Snowscape

1014.desc: A wielder of ice magic carrying a terrifying axe stands in your way. A fierce battle is about to start, but make it quick. The snowfield's exit is near.
1014.name: The Blizzard Begins

101400.desc: Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!
101400.name: Year-End Bonus Day 1

101500.desc: Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!
101500.name: Year-End Bonus Day 2

101600.desc: Celebrate the New Year in this special once a day dungeon! We hope you enjoy all we have in store this year for Brave Frontier!
101600.name: Year-End Bonus Day 3

101700.desc: The Six Sibyl Sisters were said to have rescued many people. Here lays a shrine dedicated to one of them. Why was it they reached out to save the people?
101700.name: Affectionate Flames Lv. 3

101701.desc: The Blaze Sibyl saved the people with an affectionate heart of mercy. However, that in turn led to her fighting her sisters. The sadness from that fight still lingers.
101701.name: Affectionate Flames Lv. 4

101800.desc: The ice cold air pricks at your skin, but what awaits ahead is a sibyl said to have a glacial glare even colder than ice.
101800.name: Absolute Zero Lv. 3

101801.desc: A blade of ice that shines clear and bright thanks to the blood of the people it has fed on. Perhaps this is a symbol of her true pure nature.
101801.name: Absolute Zero Lv. 4

101900.desc: The land that was once covered with beautiful blossoming flowers now exists as a dark, cold place, just like the memories of the young Rose Sibyl.
101900.name: Gaia's Voice Lv. 3

101901.desc: The young Rose Sibyl was best known for her sweet childlike smile. But do not underestimate her, for pure innocence and pure ruthlessness are two sides of the same coin.
101901.name: Gaia's Voice Lv. 4

1020.desc: The verdant ocean of trees lives up to its name. Wherever you look, the sun's rays are blocked by lush greenery. Under your feet, the ground is covered in grass and moss.
1020.name: Hunter in the Green

102000.desc: The sisters once chatted joyfully in the land of thunder. Now, not a trace of their happiness can be found.
102000.name: In the Name of Thunder Lv. 3

102001.desc: Do these bolts of lightning represent the rage of a sibyl of destruction, or are they her tears, shed over the battle with her sisters? The truth will never be known.
102001.name: In the Name of Thunder Lv. 4

1021.desc: Unlike the tundra, the forest is full of what looks like landmarks. But they are starting to lead you astray as you trip over the thick grass.
1021.name: Trials in the Forest

102100.desc: This sparkling shrine was once the pride of the Six Sisters. Now, without a master, rampant monsters lurk in alongside the souls of the sibyls of destruction.
102100.name: Protected by the Sky Lv. 3

102101.desc: The sibyl who had the kindness and mercy to forgive all sins, yet she couldn't save those closest to her. What might she reveal to a Summoner able to capture her?
102101.name: Protected by the Sky Lv. 4

1022.desc: All of a sudden, sunshine bathes you as the old growth gives way to young foliage. The fresh flowers are a pleasure to your senses.
1022.name: Pretty Little Flowers

102200.desc: The shrine sparkles like a star scattered sky. Just like the night sky it is breathtaking yet terrifying, awakening one's primal fear of the dark.
102200.name: Enthralled by the Moon Lv. 3

102201.desc: She was too engrossed in pursuing her ideals which is why she couldn't forgive anything. Regardless the passage of time, this never changed.
102201.name: Enthralled by the Moon Lv. 4

1023.desc: You happen upon an old tree that manages to stand out in the ocean of its peers. Though not much taller than the others, it is far wider. You must make your way around it.
1023.name: The Majestic Trees

1024.desc: Further into the ocean of trees you see some covered in exquisite flowers. Their petals rain down as the armored princess and gunner from another world approach.
1024.name: Showdown under the Flowers

102800.desc: Entry to the Mysterious Paradise is only granted once a day. Croaking voices can be heard echoing in the distance.
102800.name: Mysterious Paradise

102810.desc: Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices, something can be seen sparkling from inside.
102810.name: Ultimate Paradise

102820.desc: Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices, something can be seen sparkling from inside.
102820.name: Ultimate Paradise

102830.desc: Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices, something can be seen sparkling from inside.
102830.name: Ultimate Paradise

102840.desc: Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices, something can be seen sparkling from inside.
102840.name: Ultimate Paradise

102850.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside...
102850.name: Celestial Garden

102851.desc: You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with...
102851.name: Garden of Imps

102860.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside...
102860.name: Celestial Garden

102861.desc: You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with...
102861.name: Garden of Imps

102870.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside...
102870.name: Celestial Garden

102871.desc: You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with...
102871.name: Garden of Imps

102880.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside...
102880.name: Celestial Garden

102881.desc: You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with...
102881.name: Garden of Imps

102890.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside...
102890.name: Celestial Garden

102891.desc: You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with...
102891.name: Garden of Imps

102900.desc: Entry to the Mysterious Paradise is only granted once a day. Croaking voices can be heard echoing in the distance.
102900.name: Mysterious Paradise

102910.desc: This entrance to the heavens opens only once a day. Multiple kinds of croaking can be heard from outside...
102910.name: Celestial Garden

102911.desc: You can only enter the Garden of Imps once a day. Little creatures are calling for a host to fuse with...
102911.name: Garden of Imps

1030.desc: Leave Lugina and Seria to their own devices for now. Around this bog are the lingering traces of civilization, as if it was once someone's home.
1030.name: Lightning Strikes

103000.desc: A knight who once led a refugee escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. What could he be thinking now that he has shown himself once again?
103000.name: Guiding Knight Lv. 5

103001.desc: The sword that once protected people during the war with the gods is now pointed in your direction. And with it, stern eyes that seem to test you.
103001.name: Guiding Knight Lv. 6

1031.desc: Rain pours down with incessant lightning. Just as you start to suspect that enemies lurk here, an ambush strikes from above!
1031.name: Trial by Firestorm

103100.desc: A martial artist from the Toltya Dojo that protected those headed to Elgaia. Having regained his many secret techniques, now he stands in your way.
103100.name: Martial Artist Lv. 5

103101.desc: The secret techniques of the Toltya Dojo defeated countless gods during the great escape. This master's eyes look towards the future, ready to battle.
103101.name: Martial Artist Lv. 6

1032.desc: You proceed around the outskirts of the bog as the rain drenches you. The enemy attacks are as relentless as the storm, taking their toll on your stamina.
1032.name: Blade of the Heart

103200.desc: The youngster who planned the escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. Once she makes use of her brilliant intellect once again, how will it affect this era?
103200.name: Friend Power Lv. 5

103201.desc: The eyes of the youngster who used her intellect to help her dear friends now stare at you silently. A strong will lies deep within them.
103201.name: Friend Power Lv. 6

1033.desc: The cacophony of thunder threatens to burst your eardrums. Each time the lightning strikes, so do your enemies' swords, raising the hair on the back of your soaked neck.
1033.name: Earth Shattering Lightning Storm

103300.desc: A young magician who guided the people after receiving a divine revelation from the gods. Could the will of the gods have brought her back as well?
103300.name: Holy Revelation Lv. 5

103301.desc: The childhood friends that once fought by her side are no longer present. And yet she looks forward, believing in the dawn of a new era.
103301.name: Holy Revelation Lv. 6

1034.desc: You reach the opposite end of the marsh. It doesn't seem like Grahdens is being held anywhere around here. Proceed to the sea.
1034.name: Terminal Thunderstorm

103400.desc: A heavily armored knight who saved many people during the escape to Elgaia. The white armor that once protected many now obstructs your path.
103400.name: Light the Way Lv. 5

103401.desc: A strong soul that aided those who led the escape to Elgaia. One to look towards the future, his past remains a mystery. What path will he show you?
103401.name: Light the Way Lv. 6

103500.desc: A knight from the Bariura Empire who defied the emperor and led his people to Elgaia. Bearing great pride, his soul has descended to Elgaia once more.
103500.name: Twilight Pride Lv. 5

103501.desc: Though you seek peace for Grand Gaia, the ire he once held during the duel with his knight companion over their plan of escape is now directed at you!
103501.name: Twilight Pride Lv. 6

103600.desc: A curious stage has been found deep within ancient ruins. And with it, a young songstress singing atop it. What could her message to the Summoners be?
103600.name: Shining Stage Lv. 1

103601.desc: A diva found on the odd stage in the ruins. Her angelic voice continues to charm all Summoners. However, a certain one among them would change her...
103601.name: Shining Stage Lv. 2

103602.desc: A diva found on the odd stage in the ruins. With a voice that once charmed the gods themselves, its sound makes humans forget the passage of time.
103602.name: Shining Stage Lv. 3

1040.desc: The sun starts to dye the sky a blood orange hue. Though you can't see the tower Tilith spoke of, it mustn't be far. Keep going.
1040.name: Lightning to the Heart

1041.desc: Mare's abduction of Karl was an act of suicide. But why would Zevalhua take Grahdens captive?
1041.name: The Long Shot

1042.desc: The sea breeze feels comfortable against your skin, as does the sunlight coming from your left. But do not let your guard down.
1042.name: Protection at All Costs

1043.desc: The rocky stretch under took some getting used to. But now that you have your feet planted, it's the perfect fighting ground.
1043.name: Impending Radiance

1044.desc: At this time of day, you must pay attention to your position in battle. When your enemies stand between you and the sun, their movements are hard to read.
1044.name: Light from Above

1045.desc: You avoided the god of destruction, but now you must face the warrior with eight blades on her back. This is a crucial stage--your enemies have no plans to rest.
1045.name: Daylight behind Her

1050.desc: These ruins were once the capital of Agni, known as Mirvana. Exposed to the worst of warfare, the city still bears its scars.
1050.name: Those Who Live by the Sword

1051.desc: At time there are cracks in the darkness that appear to bones. Your ears pick up on what sounds like the woeful cries of long dead soldiers.
1051.name: Penetrate the Impenetrable Darkness

1052.desc: The festering miasma in this town is not simply the remnants of warfare. You are certain that forbidden curses were used in these parts.
1052.name: The Endless Blackout

1053.desc: Judging by the dismal state of the town, the people kept fighting even after the surrounding walls were destroyed. Their determination is to be respected.
1053.name: Protector, Destructor

1054.desc: Something unusual stands before you amidst the rubble. Made of metal, it appears to be a summoned hero. Proceed slowly.
1054.name: Lingering in the Ruins

1055.desc: The smell of blood coming from near the gate opposite to the one you entered fills your nostrils. The tower is clos, but so is a very powerful enemy force.
1055.name: Broken Days

1060.desc: You finally reach the tower atop the cape. Head for its top for your showdown against Zevalhua. Defeat the Fallen God so you can save Grahdens!
1060.name: Dance in the Clouds

1061.desc: Sunlight pours into the tower, as if cheering you on. But you must have no time for such thoughts and must head upward toward your enemy.
1061.name: Prayer at Dawn

1062.desc: A hero from another world is waiting for you on this floor. Though it will not be an easy fight, it should be a fair one since you made it this far.
1062.name: Drenched in Crimson

1063.desc: As you climb up the stairs, you see a tremendous enemy blocking the sunlight. Make the heroes before you proud and trounce this ten-winged tormentor!
1063.name: The Golden Halo

1064.desc: You have never felt air this thick with tension and signs of enemies nearby. Prepare yourself, for the next battle may be your last.
1064.name: The Rainbow Battlefield

1065.desc: Everybody knows of the hero from Agni clad in flames. His reputation precedes him, like the sinister air that fills the passageway in front of you.
1065.name: The Burning Hero

1066.desc: You have made it to the top of the tower after defeating the burning hero. But now you must do what the gods couldn't and defeat the Fallen God Zevalhua!
1066.name: The Divine Emperor

11.desc: The calm grasslands keep on going.The monsters here are just right for a beginner.Keep moving forward.
11.name: Monsters of the Prairie

1100.desc: The air is scolding hot above the boiling lava. Despite the surroundings, Paris's expression remains cool.
1100.name: Absolute Heat

1101.desc: The hot air burns to the touch. This is all too familiar, though, surely the fire wielding hero waits ahead.
1101.name: Whirling Vapors

1102.desc: Flames rise from the lava, robbing you of the little oxygen which remains, and the further you run ahead, the more fiery heroes block your path.
1102.name: Torrent of Flames

1103.desc: The cave ceiling is higher here. The surrounding flames are different in this area. What manner of flame waits ahead?
1103.name: Dancing Sparks

1104.desc: An overwhelming force stands in your way. Prepare yourself, as it seems the last Fallen God has sent forth the legendary Disastrous Beast.
1104.name: The Disasterous Beast

1110.desc: Zurg... What could the last of the Fallen Gods be plotting. You can't help but wonder as you gaze upon the beautiful aquatic metropolis.
1110.name: Young Lady's Guardian

1111.desc: You can see to the bottom of the beautifully flowing river. Remembering Zurg's words, you search for a path to Vriksha.
1111.name: Overflowing Power

1112.desc: A gorgeous palace stands in the center of town. However, the fountain in its courtyard stands frozen. Soon an ice wielding hero is upon you.
1112.name: The Frozen Palace

1113.desc: Leaving the palace alongside the river, the surface of the water suddenly explodes. The water freezes above as bullets of ice are shot your way.
1113.name: The Parting Waters

1114.desc: You can see a massive object blocking the exit from the Sea Capital. There's no mistake, it's the legendary freezing weapon.
1114.name: Ice Walled Fortress

1120.desc: This forest was once home to a prosperous city, the ruins of which can be seen periodically through the undergrowth. What could've happened to it?
1120.name: Dweller in the Depths

1121.desc: Though the way has been spotted with ruins, there are now none in sight. This area has likely been a simple forest since long ago.
1121.name: The Endless Forest

1122.desc: The heroes who block your path are the same ones who once opposed the gods. Now summoned by those same gods, what could they be thinking?
1122.name: Deep in the Green

1123.desc: Though Lugina warned you not to overthink things, you can't help but get lost in thought. Something just isn't right.
1123.name: Mother Forest

1124.desc: You're nearly out of the forest, but you must defeat the legendary guardian before you. Prepare yourself as you face off with the stone-like guardian.
1124.name: Stonewall Defender

1130.desc: Just past the bridge is Alnakeid Castle. You must defeat the wicked presence there to proceed to Vriksha, as far off as it may still be.
1130.name: Lightning Blockade

1131.desc: Passing the castle walls, you venture through a watch tower to find another wall. The roar of lightning around you holds the power of a massive army.
1131.name: Intersecting Light

1132.desc: Doubt grows within you. The Four Fallen Gods should have been fighting together. What difference is there in the disputes between gods and humans?
1132.name: Shocking Courage

1133.desc: There are now cracks to be found in the fortress walls. As unnecessary as it is, the stronghold between the three capitals still serves its purpose.
1133.name: Surging Spirit

1134.desc: A fight awaits you at Danrard's final gate. You're greeted by an angel who once took to the sky in search of freedom.
1134.name: Treacherous Angel

1140.desc: Though it now lies in ruins, the town remains lit by a glass-sided, gravestone-like tower. The scene is quite mysterious.
1140.name: Talented War Maiden

1141.desc: Could scenes like this be commonplace in the otherworld? Also, what happened to the god who was supposed to have destroyed this town?
1141.name: The Last Defender

1142.desc: It seems the cave just outside the city could be your way to Alnakeid Castle. Surely, incredibly powerful foes await you there.
1142.name: Light's Oppression

1143.desc: The lit path you walk suddenly opens up into a large plaza. You're awaited by a just swordsman and the roar of a dragon.
1143.name: Justice's Obstruction

1144.desc: You spot a white figure in front of the gate leading from the town. Is it the legendary Keeper of Order? All you can do is fight your way through.
1144.name: Keeper of Order

1150.desc: Tilith seems to be acting strange. On top of that, even Paris isn't her normal cool self. What's going on?
1150.name: Power in the Darkness

1151.desc: An oddly glowing crystal floats inside the darkened cave. Stare at it too long and you might find yourself under its spell.
1151.name: A Seductive Trap

1152.desc: As the enemy's attack reaches a whole new level, you sense a powerful force coming from deep inside the cave. Surely, a strong foe awaits.
1152.name: Power of the Abyss

1153.desc: Exhausted by all the fighting, you stop for a quick break. However, upon moving forward a chill runs down your spine. Something wicked lies ahead...
1153.name: Scattered Death

1154.desc: Feeling the wind, you realize you might soon be out of the cave. But before proceeding, you must first defeat a legendary demon.
1154.name: The Half-Demon Girl

1160.desc: Entering the hall, you're surrounded by enemies. You must defeat them before moving forward, as exhausted as you may be.
1160.name: Mother Nature's Song

1161.desc: Leaving the hall, you come across a pair of foes harvesting the powers of light and dark. Defeat the minions before taking on these two.
1161.name: Light & Dark Concerto

1162.desc: You exit into a grand space decorated with swords. The countless scars that adorn the walls and pillars show the intense battle that took place here.
1162.name: Dancing Light Blades

1163.desc: This seems to be the courtyard. It is lined with beautiful sculptures, and the pond is filled with clean water. However, enemies still lurk nearby.
1163.name: Dance of Ice

1164.desc: Entering once again inside, your eyes spot a great fireplace glowing red. Nearby, in the dimly lit room, stands a chair made of leather.
1164.name: Crimson Waltz

1165.desc: You exit onto the castle's roof. The god Zurg spoke of should be at the top of the tower ahead. However, a hero of lightning blocks your way.
1165.name: Symphony of Thunder

1166.desc: You've reached the spiral staircase inside the tower of the castle. It isn't tall, but it's full of enemies, the strongest awaiting you at the end.
1166.name: Call of the Storm

12.desc: You can see a rocky mountain faintly on the horizon. Tilith is waiting at the "Cave of Flames" just beyond here.
12.name: Guardians of the Prairie

1200.desc: It seems that Zurg's words are still bothering Tilith. Keep moving forward to bring her spirits back up, never looking back.
1200.name: Exploding Volcano

1201.desc: Though the temperature is rising, the morale of your party never wanes. Combine your powers and aim for the last Fallen God together.
1201.name: Sacred Bird of Flame

1202.desc: The cries of the drake echo through the mountains, but this is no foe to fear now. Make your way through the scorching path ahead as fast as you can.
1202.name: Fire Drake Cry

1203.desc: As if answering to your fighting spirit, strong warriors await ahead. Enveloped in wings of flames, these two swordsmen are swelling with energy.
1203.name: Joint Wings Ablaze

1204.desc: A gigantic shadow blocks your path at the top of the mountain. It seems there is no way to pass through the volcano without a confrontation.
1204.name: Power of Survival

1210.desc: It looks like something's on Tilith's mind. If everyone said they trust her, then what could be wrong? It's a tad worrisome.
1210.name: Battle of the Coast

1211.desc: Surprised by the sounds of footsteps, they turn out to be only small crabs. Walking on the rocky area washed by the waves, you feel like you'll slip.
1211.name: Dragon in the Abyss

1212.desc: The sounds of waves mix with a voice in song. They sing the magical song of a water spirit. The enemy isn't strong, but don't let it slow you down.
1212.name: Crystal Love Song

1213.desc: You reach the sand after the rocky area. A hero with an ambition as great as the sea, and another with a will of ice, ambush you upon arrival.
1213.name: Recital of  Waves

1214.desc: The cliff in the distance you were headed towards begins to move. It was actually your enemy, and you have no choice but to defeat it to move forward.
1214.name: Overwhelming Power

1220.desc: What could be the truth Zurg keeps mentioning? Regardless of how reliable his testimony may be, it still gets the imagination going.
1220.name: Forest of Illusion

1221.desc: The forest capital of Vriksha. Seeing how much it truly differs from the Vriksha of yore, you can't help but wonder what happened to this country.
1221.name: The Great Tree's Life

1222.desc: Strange, this is the same path you took before. It seems that the forest is enchanted. You must find the source of this spell and eliminate it.
1222.name: A Fairy's Smile

1223.desc: Exiting to an open space lit by the sun, the birds shriek. A hero with a weapon from another world, and another with a magic lance, stand before you.
1223.name: Dark Green Concerto

1224.desc: A mountain made of stone suddenly appears before you. Just when you thought it was in your way, it swings at you. It's a puppet controlled by magic!
1224.name: Defense at Any Cost

1230.desc: Though Paris is hostile towards the Summoners' Hall, there's a particular antagonism in the air when she looks at Grahdens. It must mean something.
1230.name: Poisonous Swamp

1231.desc: Water tainted red and a mysterious creature shining light by it. Out of all the places you've been to so far, this one feels the eeriest. Be careful.
1231.name: Collapse of the Beast

1232.desc: A deafening voice combined with the flash of thunder. A bird soars the skies creating electric shocks as it revolves. But it's not just one bird...
1232.name: Thunder Batter

1233.desc: As the thunder clouds roar in the sky, rain starts to fall. At the same time, two heroes appear and obstruct your path. You sense a fight is imminent.
1233.name: Lightning Feast

1234.desc: The rain has ceased and light trickles through the clouds. As if on a staircase of light, an angel descends. Defeat her and proceed to the Sky Palace.
1234.name: Unleashed Power

1240.desc: No matter how true Zurg's words may be, helping him to destroy humans is not an option. Of course, you wouldn't betray the Goddess anyway.
1240.name: Peaceful Garden

1241.desc: You can't believe that such a beautiful garden floats in midair just like that. What sort of magic could be at work here?
1241.name: The Supreme Dragon

1242.desc: A fighting goddess forbids you from moving forward, as if she cannot forgive those who disturb her garden. However, there's no stopping now.
1242.name: The Gods' Martial Art

1243.desc: You reach the castle at the heart of the garden. When you set foot there, a hero wielding a holy blade and a knight with a great sword appear.
1243.name: The Knight's Guidance

1244.desc: You can see the gate that marks the exit of the Sky Palace. However, in front of it stands a shiny and pale king of beasts. It's time for battle.
1244.name: The Power of Guidance

1250.desc: Tilith seems to be feeling better, which is a relief. No one else is hung up on Zurg's words either. With a unified front, head towards Adan's Tower.
1250.name: Fortress of Ignorance

1251.desc: This eerie place makes it feel like ghosts could appear at any moment. Proceed with caution. You're getting closer to enemy territory now.
1251.name: Death God of Darkness

1252.desc: A feeling of uneasiness lingers in the air, but you travel lightly on your feet. Knowing you must defeat the Fallen God, there's no time to waste.
1252.name: Demon King's Reign

1253.desc: The ill wills of revenge and madness prevent you from stepping any further. The hero waiting ahead looks powerful, so prepare yourself.
1253.name: The Fury of Darkness

1254.desc: A young woman awaits outside the rear gate of the castle. It would seem she's holding a sword in her right hand, and concentrated magic on the other.
1254.name: Piercing Power

1260.desc: The surroundings are overflowing with the presence of the enemy. Head for the top while Karl serves as a distraction. The real battle draws near.
1260.name: Gate of Invitation

1261.desc: You cannot find the staircase that leads upstairs, so you take the only way available deep inside. The path seems slanted, slowly curving upwards.
1261.name: The Endless Hallway

1262.desc: The curved hallway spirals upwards and upwards. If you stumble when you lose in battle, you may end up tumbling all the way down...
1262.name: The Crooked Slope

1263.desc: You reach the top to find a large room. As if the same type of powerful enemy had been waiting for you all along, you're suddenly attacked.
1263.name: Black Hole Plaza

1264.desc: You go upstairs, open the doors, and find another large room. After just one step, the doors close and a strong enemy is summoned. Just a bit more.
1264.name: Path of No Return

1265.desc: After a fierce battle, you climb your way up through some narrow stairs. On your way to the top an enemy shows itself, but there's no going back now!
1265.name: Narrow Stairs

1266.desc: Finally at the top, there's no doubt that Zurg is waiting. If you defeat the disciple of the last Fallen God, Afla Dilith will be the only enemy left!
1266.name: The Speech Maker

1300.desc: You look far into the distance and notice the shadow of an eerie castle. They say that it is the last form Afla Dilith morphed into...
1300.name: Desert Hound

1301.desc: The footprints of Lugina and the others who had gone ahead have vanished. Strong gusts of wind hit the sand dunes, continuously changing their shape.
1301.name: Smoldering Sun

1302.desc: The blazing sun is wearing you down, dehydrating you. You've crossed many scorching territories so far, but somehow never seem to grow used to them.
1302.name: Becoming Cinders

1303.desc: As the sparkling sand reflects the sunlight, your feet grow hotter and hotter. At this rate they'll end up well-done while they roast...
1303.name: Hot Sand's Furnace

1304.desc: Your thirst and the sun aren't your only enemies. Afla Dilith has dispatched assassins who are closing in on you. The end of the desert isn't far now.
1304.name: Infinite Valor

1310.desc: Indeed there are other gods besides the Four Fallen that reject the existence of humans. However, let's focus on the task at hand for now.
1310.name: Abyss of Sea Snakes

1311.desc: The sun shines through an ice wall and though no light is lit within the temple, it's bright inside. The light suddenly refracts, creating a rainbow.
1311.name: Rainbow Bubble

1312.desc: The solitude of the ice temple makes for a very relaxing atmosphere. However, with enemies incoming, you have no time to rest.
1312.name: Across the Raging Sea

1313.desc: Could this temple also be the work of the gods? Or is it the masterpiece of a person with otherworldly powers? It piques your curiosity.
1313.name: Shelf of Ice Crystals

1314.desc: Everything is gradually turning brighter. The exit may be close, but things will probably not be as simple as you think.
1314.name: Unforgettable Heart

1320.desc: An ancient forest that few have visited before. There seem to be no natural paths. You'll have to use your sense of direction to get out of this one.
1320.name: Enchanted Fairy Grove

1321.desc: A strange feeling overcomes you. You've sensed this atmosphere in many of the forests you have passed through so far. No doubt spirits are near.
1321.name: Treetops of Illusion

1322.desc: Along with a shrilling cry, a flock of birds flies off frightened. A loud roar follows after. It's the sound of an otherworldly machine at work!
1322.name: The Hive's Den

1323.desc: You get the feeling that something is inviting you deep into the sea of trees. You can't help thinking you're being led to a den full of enemies.
1323.name: Noble Monarch

1324.desc: The space between the trees has widened. The end of the forest may be near. This can only mean that enemies more powerful than before await you.
1324.name: Relentless Blade

1330.desc: The fate of the future... What Paris told you is starting to make sense. However, you must first focus on defeating the last Fallen God.
1330.name: Electric Eyes

1331.desc: The large drops of rain won't stop, striking you as they fall. Your body gets colder, and as you sneeze, the sound of thunder resonates around you.
1331.name: Thunder Beast's Clash

1332.desc: You can tell that in Aldahlia the buildings soaked in rainwater have been eroding away. You start to wonder how long this rain will keep falling.
1332.name: Like a Lighting Flash

1333.desc: A bright bolt of lightning tears the sky apart. After a second of waiting, a deafening sound hits your ears. Lighting struck dangerously close.
1333.name: Creator of Ruin

1334.desc: The continuous roaring of the thunder has made your ears feel funny. You wouldn't survive an ambush in this state, so you best be cautious.
1334.name: No Surrender

1340.desc: It's still a long way to Afla Dilith, but everyone keeps talking about what will come after that. Let's not worry about those things for now.
1340.name: Herd of Pegasus

1341.desc: The herd of Pegasus was just frightened, but something more alarming soars the skies. War goddesses spread their wings to prepare for battle.
1341.name: Imperial Guard Honor

1342.desc: This road offers a clear view of the surroundings, so there's no fear of an ambush. However, there's nothing you can use to deflect aerial attacks.
1342.name: The Path You Trust

1343.desc: How long have you advanced? Now you can really see the castle Afla Dilith has assimilated with. Is that what you will face in the future?
1343.name: Radiant Strike

1344.desc: A road for pilgrims. Long ago, pilgrims passed through here to pray to the gods. Ironically, you're taking this road in order to defeat a god.
1344.name: Where Loyalty Lies

1345.desc: The end of the road is near. A strong power can be felt coming from it. The enemy lurking there will most likely be your last obstacle here.
1345.name: Unforgiving Light

1350.desc: You are overwhelmed by the gigantic stature of the castle-like Afla Dilith. However, everyone is counting on you, so there's no time to waste.
1350.name: The Lifeless Snake

1351.desc: There are still many enemies left on the way to the castle. Surely Karl and the others will have to face even more of them as you move on ahead.
1351.name: Crawling Toward Death

1352.desc: The sound of your allies fighting behind you grows louder. Head towards the castle while everyone else draws the enemies' attention.
1352.name: The Putrid Tome

1353.desc: The enemies in your path continue getting stronger. It can only mean that your last target is drawing near. The castle's gates should be just ahead.
1353.name: Heaps of Corpses

1354.desc: The castle is within a stone's throw, and the god's powerful presence grows stronger. However, it's no time to buckle under pressure. Step inside.
1354.name: The Final Hour

1355.desc: You can see the last hoard of enemies in front of the gate. If you can get past them, you will finally be inside Afla Dilith!
1355.name: Fighting Death

1360.desc: Tilith, Karl, everyone... You're worried about the friends you left behind fighting. However, there's no turning back now. You must press forward.
1360.name: Ends & Beginnings

1361.desc: Looking inside the castle, nothing really seems out of place. Although without Tilith's protective barrier, you might have fallen prey to Afla Dilith.
1361.name: Heaven & Earth Divide

1362.desc: You can hear Tilith fighting from the entrance. Inspired by her courage, your feet rush forward at full speed!
1362.name: Turning the Tide

1363.desc: As you proceed further in, the sounds of battle coming from the entrance disappear. You can still feel Tilith's barrier protecting you, though.
1363.name: Rejecting Sublation

1364.desc: You've made your way through a big portion of the fortress. Past this corridor lies its center. The real body of the Fallen God is probably there.
1364.name: Universal Equality

1365.desc: You exit into a room enveloped in tree roots. The next step should lead you to the heart of the castle, but a dark hero blocks your path.
1365.name: Back to the Roots

1366.desc: The time for the real final fight with the last Fallen God, the Beast God Afla Dilith, has come... Defeat him and return to your friends!
1366.name: The God of Truth

1370.desc: After visiting the temple a second time, you think you hear the voice of a young girl singing. Her song made the rough waves vanish like the sea foam.
1370.name: Song from the Seabed

1400.desc: A hair raising howling can be heard. It looks like many monsters seem to inhabit this town, so there seems to be no easy escape from here.
1400.name: Blazing Transgression

1401.desc: A beautiful singing voice lingers in the air. Could this be the work of a demon as well? And why have so many monsters gathered in this ghost town?
1401.name: Cursed Singing Voice

1402.desc: How strange. No matter how much you advance, you keep finding yourself back where you started. It's like being in the fairies' grove all over again.
1402.name: Idle Gossip

1403.desc: There are too many enemies. What could've led them here? As you think that to yourself, a piercing and thunderous sound resonates around you.
1403.name: Within the Commotion

1404.desc: The neigh of a Pegasus reaches your ears, a pure sound ill-fitted for this ghost town. A battle with the maidens awaits ahead.
1404.name: Meeting the Maidens

1405.desc: You can feel many more enemies obstructing your way now. If you're lucky enough, defeating the last hoard of them might be your ticket out of here.
1405.name: Night Draws Near

1410.desc: You can see a vast desert in front of you. There seems to be no end to it, but you must take this cruel path in order to move forward.
1410.name: Vast Sea of Sand

1411.desc: You confirm the sun's location to avoid losing your way. Short on patience and with your body almost boiling, beads of sweat fall from your forehead.
1411.name: Great Desert Path

1412.desc: A cloud of sand starts covering your clothes. You swallow the fine pieces of sand the wind picks up as you breathe. Deserts are still not your forte.
1412.name: The Sword & Axe Dance

1413.desc: As the sunshine gets hotter, heat haze begins to rise from beneath. Beyond the shaky mirage in front of you, you spy the creeping shadow of the enemy.
1413.name: Rising Heat Shimmer

1414.desc: A cloudless, blue firmament above, and scorching, yellow sand beneath. As you look behind you, everything grows darker. A sandstorm is on its way.
1414.name: Paladin Paris

1420.desc: After leaving the great the desert behind, you come across a river so big that the shore seems invisible. It will take a lot of effort to cross it.
1420.name: Crossing the River

1421.desc: At times, the river fish jump high up. Surprised by the sound, you finally see the enemy closing in. You realize now the fish were trying to warn you.
1421.name: The Deep Riverbed

1422.desc: Halfway up the river you hear a creaking noise and see that the surface of the river has begun to freeze. It seems the enemy is here.
1422.name: Glistening Riverside

1423.desc: As you admire the grandeur of this river, you reminisce of battle. Even though you have defeated the Four Fallen Gods, other battles still lie ahead.
1423.name: In Order to Flow

1424.desc: A strong wind blows. The water's surface ripples, and then crashes in a big splash. It may be a sign of the road up ahead, which makes you nervous.
1424.name: Surging Bay Breeze

1430.desc: As you walk through the thick forest, you get lost. The path to a free future... You'll have to make your own way to get there.
1430.name: Endless Foliage

1431.desc: You arrive at a place in the forest where a small spring bubbles. You consider taking a rest, but enemies start appearing one by one. Break's over.
1431.name: The Forest's Fountain

1432.desc: A strong wind blows in the forest. As the leaves brush upon each other they sound like the waves of the ocean. It's a sea of trees indeed.
1432.name: Godspeed Gale

1433.desc: Breeze blows strongly through the trees, picking up old leaves, and fluttering new ones. This is the force that transforms the forest anew.
1433.name: Budding Earth

1434.desc: The sea of trees sways as the wind hits it. One could say that even these living beings feel anxious about the future fate of the world.
1434.name: Boisterous Trees

1440.desc: The rough, shiny rock around shows traces of lightning. It seems it has been absorbing it during the endless storms. Pressing forward won't be easy.
1440.name: A Painful Climb

1441.desc: As you climb an electrified cliff, you pass peaks as sharp as needles. You can't help but feel like this road is a premonition of the future to come.
1441.name: Watcher at the Summit

1442.desc: The thunder and lightning that falls here is absorbed by the mountain. It has accumulated so much after the years that it might burst any minute now.
1442.name: Dark Clouds Await

1443.desc: You've reached the Mt. Granakia's highest peak, where you can see the whole of Atharva. You see a giant castle in the distance. Is that Eriole's base?
1443.name: Higher than the Sky

1444.desc: You can see Paris at the bottom of the cliff. It seems she followed you here. You were told to talk to her, but what exactly do you have in mind?
1444.name: Royal Guard Paris

1450.desc: After climbing over the mountain, you reach a beautiful garden. However, no people seem to come here, so how has it been kept so well maintained?
1450.name: The Garden of Life

1451.desc: Beautiful flower beds are arranged next to each other in the garden. These amazing flowers couldn't have bloomed without lots of care, and yet...
1451.name: Flowers Bloom Proudly

1452.desc: You can see a fountain amidst the flower beds. The water sparkles as it flows from a beautifully carved pedestal. What a great spectacle to behold.
1452.name: Pursuing Wisdom

1453.desc: Small birds flutter about, chirping a song. One flees suddenly, and when you follow it with your eyes, you see a great shadow dropping from the sky...
1453.name: Revering the Heavens

1454.desc: The floral aroma, the chirping of the birds, and the beauty of the trimmed hedges... Looking at it now, this is a beautiful, if not perfect, garden.
1454.name: Instrumental Trio

1455.desc: Could this garden have been made by human hands? How could it have remained so beautiful without any people left to care for it?
1455.name: Demanding Justice

1456.desc: Small flowers sway in the wind, butterflies flutter about, and the birds fly high in the sky. A wind of new beginnings is leaving the old age behind.
1456.name: Wind of Beginnings

1460.desc: Having passed the gorgeous garden, you reach a gloomy cemetery. Among the expressionless tombstones standing, a voice calls from within the silence.
1460.name: Where Souls Sleep

1461.desc: Tesla said Paris was useless to them now. If Eriole truly feels that way, then just what could he be after...?
1461.name: Graveyard Banquet

1462.desc: This part of the cemetery seems to be dedicated to soldiers fallen in battle. You can see that their tombstones have a sword symbol carved onto them.
1462.name: A Soldier's Tombstone

1463.desc: If a civil war breaks in Elgaia, many lives will be lost. This must be prevented at all costs.
1463.name: Funeral Candles

1464.desc: Reading the few words you can make out from the headstones, you gather that this was once one of the most important places in Atharva.
1464.name: Carved Slab

1465.desc: You feel something cold run down your spine. Feeling an evil presence, you look around you. Darkness is closing in, the enemy's coming!
1465.name: Dangerous Territory

1466.desc: Not even the wind seems to reach this place, and your movements start to feel sluggish. The smell of moss and mold lingers in the air.
1466.name: Winding Down

1470.desc: The spark of battle has been ignited. Defeat the enemies standing in your way, and head towards the depths of Eriole's castle!
1470.name: To the Shiny Palace

1471.desc: A cold steel blade strikes at you, and fiery claws rush towards you. No matter who the enemy may be, you must not falter!
1471.name: Gate to a New Era

1472.desc: A fist cracks the floor open, and a lance tries to pierce you as you counterattack. Strong enemies have gathered here, but you must press on!
1472.name: Garden of Truth

1473.desc: Lightning flashes in the hall, and a sword that seems to block darkness shimmers brightly. If you want to stop the revolution, focus on the enemy now!
1473.name: The Sage & the Hero

1474.desc: Light pierces the walls, and countless arrows begin to rain down. The enemy is strong, but you still have morale. Hurry and make your way through!
1474.name: Establishing Order

1475.desc: Dual blades dance in the air, and one strike from a hefty lance breaks the floor open. Just a bit more till you face Eriole deep in the castle.
1475.name: Thriving Cornerstone

1476.desc: The shadow overhead is just as strong as the light. The world is being distorted, probably tearing at the seams. You're just steps away from Eriole!
1476.name: Unification Pillar

1477.desc: Eriole's ideas are warped. The idea that a bloody revolution can bring about a peaceful future cannot possibly be true. He must be stopped.
1477.name: Eriole

1480.desc: You discover a cave dispersing an ominous miasma. There are traces of a strong seal at the entrance, but you seem to be able to come and go freely.
1480.name: Crucible of Confusion

150000.desc: Fire Hero Vargas vol. 1 - Vargas, in his younger days. It wasn't long before the proud title he built for himself crumbled before him.
150000.name: Young Flames

150001.desc: Fire Hero Vargas vol. 2 - The days he ventured in search of strength. His countless fierce battles gave birth to the "Hero of the Fierce Flame."
150001.name: Trial by Fire

150002.desc: Fire Hero Vargas vol. 3 - The violent battle with the gods. Fighting alongside his comrades as well as rivals, this is where the fire hero's legend began.
150002.name: Supreme God of Fire

150010.desc: Ice Hero Selena vol. 1 - Continuing to reject taking on the responsibility of head of the Savat people, she ventures out to slay monsters.
150010.name: Modest Swordswoman

150011.desc: Ice Hero Selena vol. 2 - Upon inheriting the treasured sword Lexida as proof of her leadership, Selena ventures to many lands under her new title.
150011.name: Inherited Purpose

150012.desc: Ice Hero Selena vol. 3 - As the gods begin their attack, the people unite as one, and the legend of the Ice Goddess begins.
150012.name: Goddess of Ice

150020.desc: Earth Hero Lance vol. 1 - Lance and his demon pike. Continuing his fateful journey, many a powerful foe appeared before him.
150020.name: The Demon Pike's Seed

150021.desc: Earth Hero Lance vol. 2 - Led by his demon pike, Lance headed for the World Tree. However, something was waiting for him there.
150021.name: Revival of the World Tree

150022.desc: Earth Hero Lance vol. 3 - The gods' invasion had at last begun. Inspired by the demon pike, this is where the earth hero's legend began.
150022.name: The Forest's Sublimation

150030.desc: Thunder Hero Eze vol. 1 - Eze, in his younger days as a demon bounty hunter. Experience the fateful meeting that changed his life forever.
150030.name: The Lone Bounty Hunter

150031.desc: Thunder Hero Eze vol. 2 - Aware of his own weaknesses, he immerses himself in training. That is when he finds his partner for life.
150031.name: In Shining Shadows

150032.desc: Thunder Hero Eze vol. 3 - In the violent battle with the gods, he almost loses what matters to him most. Watch, as he unlocks his true power!
150032.name: The Unrivalled Fool

150040.desc: Light Hero Atro vol. 1 - After driving a bandit away with a tree branch, Atro's hidden talent leads him to begin training in La Veda fencing.
150040.name: Hidden Talent

150041.desc: Light Hero Atro vol. 2 - After acquiring the legendary sword of light, Urias, Atro becomes a master swordsman. However, many people begin appearing...
150041.name: A Swordsman's Anguish

150042.desc: Light Hero Atro vol. 3 - The invasion of the gods has begun. Though in pain, Atro fights against the God Army for the people and is struck by tragedy.
150042.name: The Will of Urias

150050.desc: Dark Hero Magress vol. 1 - Magress, a knight of the Bariura Empire trains arduously every day in hopes of meeting the emperor's expectations.
150050.name: An Empire & a Knight

150051.desc: Dark Hero Magress vol. 2 - After his family's murder, an angry Magress spends his days in battle fueling the fire of vengeance within.
150051.name: A Wish of Vengeance

150052.desc: Dark Hero Magress vol. 3 - Eliminating all enemies from his path the ever angry and resentful Magress has finally attained the power of the gods!
150052.name: The God Eater

150100.desc: 4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 1 - After receiving a revelation, Edea sets off on a journey to search for allies to help repel the gods' attack on Palmyna.
150100.name: The Search for Allies

150101.desc: 4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 2 - The warriors head towards their decisive battle against Cardes! They must save Palmyna from the gods' invasion!
150101.name: 4 Heroes of Palmyna

150102.desc: 4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 3 - The price paid to seal Cardes was a great one. All the heroes come to gather around a dormant Edea.
150102.name: Gaia Armor Edea

2.desc: Memorize the strengths and weaknesses of each elements and how to trigger the Brave Burst!
2.name: Element & Skill

20.desc: The magma flowing within this cave gives off an intense heat. The enemies in this cave have the power of fire.
20.name: Cave of Dancing Flames

200.desc: Your journey through Morgan begins in a huge desert. The scorching haze indicates the fierce battle to come.
200.name: The Burning Desert

20000.desc: Welcome to the newly discovered realm of Cordelica. A huge gate towers above you, as if it were beckoning Summoners inside...
20000.name: Inferno Gate

2000000.desc: You think you have what it takes to defeat my mock Units? You should be really familiar with your opponent this time! I wonder how long you'll last?
2000000.name: Trial No. 001

2000001.desc: Hmm, you're better than I expected. However, if you think you can beat my next Unit, you're wrong! I doubt you'll even be able to survive the first blow!
2000001.name: Trial No. 002

2000002.desc: These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!
2000002.name: Trial No. 003

2000003.desc:
I used entirely different materials to make
this new mock Unit, you know!
You'll get quite the surprise when
you start fighting against it.
2000003.name: Trial No. 004

2000004.desc: These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!
2000004.name: The Green Menace

20001.desc: Beyond the huge gate unfolds a fiery cave. It doesn’t look like you’ll find anything worthy of investigation here, so keep moving forward.
20001.name: Cave-Dwelling Assassins

20002.desc: You’ve stumbled into a thriving monster habitat. Judging by the hungry glint in their eyes, you’re probably the first human they’ve seen in centuries.
20002.name: The Bandits’ Feast

20003.desc: There’s no respite from the scalding heat. A gust of hot wind blasting through the maze of caverns.
20003.name: Hot Gale’s Caress

20004.desc: A cold wind dries the sweat from your forehead. Could the exit be nearby? You spot a shaft of light, but it’s guarded by a formidable-looking foe...
20004.name: Before the Flame Princess

20010.desc: You exit the infernal cave and come upon a huge waterfall spanned by a breathtaking rainbow. Finally, some beautiful scenery to soothe your weary soul.
20010.name: The Foot of the Rainbow

20011.desc: A monster ambush interrupts your reverie with the scenery. Dispose of them and continue with your investigation.
20011.name: Beneath the Cascade

20012.desc: You pass behind the cascading waterfall and continue to the next area. Lugina’s warning plays in your mind, but you’re too curious to turn back now.
20012.name: Behind the Waterfall

20013.desc: The roar of the waterfall cascading around you drowns out the sound of approaching demons. They lurk in the water and shadows, waiting for their moment to pounce.
20013.name: An Invisible Presence

20014.desc: Just as you’re about to exit on the other side of Ignia Falls, a watery monarch emerges from behind the waterfall. He’s come to expel the intruders in his domain...
20014.name: The Battleaxe Descends

20020.desc: On the other side of the huge waterfall a vast forest stretches as far as the eye can see. According to Lugina, the monsters here are the most dangerous you’ve faced.
20020.name: Entering the Foliage

20021.desc: The overgrown foliage deep inside the forest is maze-like in its complexity. What lies on the other side?
20021.name: Labyrinth of Trees

20022.desc: Even after the world has been reduced to rubble, the souls of bandits continue to exist deep within the forest. They target travelers’ valuables, just like when they were alive.
20022.name: The Bandits’ Trap

20023.desc: The bandits tell of a dragon who protects all the trees in the forest. Could that be where this distant roar is coming from?
20023.name: The Roaring Warrior

20024.desc: A massive tree stretches into the heavens from the center of the forest. There's no chance of passing through the forest's twisting maze without its blessing.
20024.name: Master of Lomass

20030.desc: Do as Lugina says and defeat the hordes of monsters dwelling within the fortress. You’ll be able to continue with your investigation afterwards.
20030.name: The Moonlit Fortress

20031.desc: Scores of monsters block your path forward, but there’s no turning back now. Show them who’s boss by attacking them head-on.
20031.name: Rushing the Enemy

20032.desc: You break through the frontal defenses only to find yourself ambushed yet again, but this time from above! Time to quiet this raging beast.
20032.name: Assault from Above

20033.desc: Two monstrous birds, more ferocious than anything else you’ve encountered, lie in wait to stop the advance of any would-be intruders into their territory.
20033.name: Cold-Hearted Sentries

20034.desc: Danger awaits you in the great courtyard at the center of Valtan Fortress. Defeat whatever it is to complete Lugina's mission.
20034.name: A Peaceful Courtyard

20040.desc: You arrive at the Tower of Light hot on the heels of Lugina and Paris. Could the mystery of Cordelica really lie within its radiant and lofty walls?
20040.name: The Shining Tower

20041.desc: The roar of an ancient dragon reverberates inside the walls of the tower. Only those able to conquer their fear are worthy of scaling the tower’s heights.
20041.name: A Roar from the Darkness

20042.desc: The higher you climb, the tougher the monsters seem to get. Amid all the chaos, the sound of a beautiful and bewitching singing voice beckons you ever higher.
20042.name: Deadly Melody

20043.desc: Nothing poses a greater threat to Summoners than monsters of opposite elements cooperating to launch a combination attack. Fire and water, for instance...
20043.name: Phoenix and the Sea Monster

20044.desc: Countless monsters appear as if to drive the intruders from their hallowed tower. But what are they protecting? Part of Cordelica's past, or some other hidden truth?
20044.name: Dance of the Knight

20045.desc: As the fight continues to escalate, the sound of gunfire mixed in with the roar of monsters hints at even more danger to come. Could Lugina have found something?
20045.name: Howls and Gunshots

20046.desc: An overwhelming presence emanates from the top of the tower. Could it be the legendary power bestowed upon those who’ve heard the voice of the gods?
20046.name: The Voice of God

20050.desc: A mine shaft winds its way in the direction of the Giant's Ruins. Monsters fond of the dank conditions lurk in the shadows, their fangs occasionally glinting in the darkness.
20050.name: Into the Darkness

20051.desc: Spots of nature continue to exist even in this most man-made of environments. Unfortunately, nature isn’t always man’s ally...
20051.name: Protector of Nature

20052.desc: The dark mineshaft continues to beckon weary travelers deeper inside its murky maw. Monsters can smell fear, so whatever you do, beware your sweet scent.
20052.name: Howls in the Void

20053.desc: You emerge from what you thought was a never-ending tunnel to be greeted by a bright light, only to find out the light was actually a flash of lightning.
20053.name: Where Lightning Strikes

20054.desc: An evil air pervades the pitch-blackness of the mine’s innermost reaches. Exhausted by their travails, despair nibbles at the heart of any weary traveler on this road.
20054.name: Unifier of Demons

20055.desc: A glimmer of hope crosses your mind as you feel the route slowly ascending, though the air of death continues to loom about in the shadows around you.
20055.name: Hunter of Death

20056.desc: A faint light glimmers at the end of what seemed like never-ending darkness. Standing before it, a nightmarish monster rears its head, revealing a bewitching smile.
20056.name: Rondo of Nightmares

20060.desc: You come to some vast and ancient ruins, cloaked in an air of solemnity. The time of Cordelica’s reckoning is soon at hand. Prepare yourself for the battle ahead.
20060.name: Wandering the Ruins

20061.desc: You follow Lugina’s orders and launch yourself into the path of the marauding monsters. You have to give it all you've got on the front lines!
20061.name: Last Light of the Ruins

20062.desc: As if drawn by the heat of battle, monsters from far and wide descend upon your position. You can’t afford to rest until Lugina has defeated Grantos!
20062.name: Beneath Ebony Wings

20063.desc: Locked in the throes of battle, a strange sensation overcomes you momentarily. You don’t know what caused it, but you decide to track its source...
20063.name: A Guiding Star

20064.desc: The carvings here are even more ornate than those near the entrance of the ruins. A fresh gash runs horizontally across one of the giant frescoes. What could've done this?
20064.name: The Spoiled Fresco

20065.desc: Continuing deeper into the ruins in search of the strange sensation’s source, you come across souls driven mad mad by anger. What could have done this?
20065.name: The Meaning of Irate Souls

20066.desc: The source of the strange sensation is revealed in a legendary giants with powers rivaling those of the gods. Do you run, or stay and fight?
20066.name: Rampage of the Giants

20067.desc: After defeating the giants, you now face the toughest challenge of all in their king, Grantos. The final showdown to determine the fate of Cordelica is about to begin.
20067.name: The Giant God Awakes

20070.desc: There's a cavern just behind the Ignia Falls. A mysterious beast has awaken deep inside, seemingly disturbed by your battle with the giants. What could it be?
20070.name: The Amorphus Being

201.desc: The bandits in this burning desert have much stronger resolve that those in Mistral, and it seems they intend to block your way.
201.name: Bandit of the Desert

202.desc: A summoned being known as the king of beasts is rampaging in the desert. A fierce battle with him is unavoidable.
202.name: The Precarious Beast Master

203.desc: You've reached the desert's mid point. An incarnation of flames blocks the way, further scorching the land around it.
203.name: Incarnation of Flames

204.desc: The end of the desert is in view, and the wind now smells of the sea. However, a giant silhouette stands blocks your path...
204.name: The Power Seeking Swordsman

21.desc: Continue deeper into the Cave of Flames. Beings who control fire are waiting ahead.
21.name: Wielder of the Fire

210.desc: You've reached the shore, escaping the desert. A calm, beautiful beach awaits you, but you must still be cautious.
210.name: The Endless Shores

211.desc: A huge ship is anchored on the beach. It's a pirate ship, and it seems there's no easy way past...
211.name: Pirate of the Shallow Waters

212.desc: The beautiful view continues, as do the number of enemies you encounter. Prepare yourself for a water assault.
212.name: Knight of the Ripples

213.desc: The end of the coastline is now in view. A Water Spirit is said to appear around here. How strong could it be?
213.name: Incarnation of Water

214.desc: You've finally reached the coast's end. A dark forest is visible ahead, but surely something is lurking near...
214.name: Princess of the Icy Blade

22.desc: You've come far, but there's still no exit in site. There are supposed to be bandits in this area.
22.name: The Thief's Hideout

220.desc: Your eyes haven't adjusted to the dark since coming in from the coast. Are Karl and the others OK?
220.name: Pitch Dark Forests

221.desc: Dark forests like this are usually full of bandits. Is it that they work better in the Dark? Either way, be careful.
221.name: Thief of the Forest

222.desc: The discomfort you felt in the forests of Mistral is back, but this time it's worse. Could this be the work of a time mage?
222.name: The Hunter of Time

223.desc: It's hard telling which trees are just trees and not just monsters in hiding. If only you could escape this forest...
223.name: Incarnation of the Forest

224.desc: The darkness has lightened. The exit should be close, but there's tension in the air. Surely, the sign of a formidable foe.
224.name: The Earth Shattering Spear

23.desc: Looks like you'll be able to leave this cave soon, but there seems to be something sinister awaiting you at the end.
23.name: The Blazing Beast

230.desc: After escaping the pitch black forest, you entered a vast wasteland. The area is being torn apart by lightning.
230.name: The Thunder Wrecked Land

231.desc: You move forward as lightning strikes down all around you. Beware of incoming aerial attacks.
231.name: Thief from the Skies

232.desc: You're nearing the center of the wastelands. Did Karl and his team successfully bring down the demon they were chasing?
232.name: The Bewitching Tactician

233.desc: There's a temple barely visible in the distance. There's no sign of Karl, what has happened to him...
233.name: Incarnation of Thunder

234.desc: A summoned thunder king is blocking the path at the end of the wasteland. You must defeat him before continuing.
234.name: A Flash of Lightning

240.desc: There is a temple bathed in light. Despite it being thousands of years old, it's as beautiful as the day it was built.
240.name: Land of the Light

241.desc: You continue even deeper into the massive temple. You can make out the solemn silhouettes of pegasi standing about.
241.name: The Magnificent Pegasus

242.desc: You've nearly reached the middle of the temple. You can imagine the days when many would gather at this impressive alter.
242.name: Guardian of the Light

243.desc: You can feel the enemies growing stronger the deeper you go. Unfortunately, the only way to the Tower of Morgan is forward.
243.name: Incarnation of the Light

244.desc: You reached the temple's innermost area. A mighty swordsman awaits you, and you can surely expect a fierce battle...
244.name: Sword of Lightning Speed

250.desc: You see ruins as you escape from the temple. It seems that whatever existed here before was destroyed by a great power.
250.name: The Land Devoured by Monsters

251.desc: As you proceed, you realize the ruins cover a large area. It must have been a large city before.
251.name: The Lusting Snake

252.desc: You've come to a plaza in the middle of the ruins. An enormous church embodies the former power of this devastated city.
252.name: Face of a Saint

253.desc: Leaving the church, you continue through the ruins. The temple was so beautifully preserved, what could've happened here?
253.name: Incarnation of the Dark

254.desc: You reached the ruins' end. The majestic Tower of Morgan stands before you. However, a knight in thick armor awaits...
254.name: The Peculiar Black Knight

260.desc: Don't let Karl and Seria's wishes go to waste. Ascend the tower quickly and track down Abaddon and Graham!
260.name: The Never-Ending Tower

261.desc: This tower is like a gigantic fortress. The spiral stairs that surround its vast outer walls are the only way up...
261.name: Stairway to the Heavens

262.desc: Is this only the halfway point? You can still hear the cries from the fierce battle raging below... It's time to hurry.
262.name: Dance of Lightning Flames

263.desc: Past the halfway point, warriors summoned by Maxwell and Abaddon block the path. There's no turning back now.
263.name: Gale of the Ice Tree

264.desc: The Stairway to the Heavens has narrowed. You can no longer hear the shouts from the base. You're almost there.
264.name: Shadowless Creatures

265.desc: You've reached the top at last. Continue on and defeat Abaddon and Graham, you can't let Karl and the others down!
265.name: The Eroding Barricade

30.desc: You've emerged into a blizzard. It's so cold, watch out for enemies with water attacks.
